ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 993
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, according to Allakhazam, you re doing the rigght thing at least: http://eqbeastiary.allakhazam.com/search.shtml?id=6449 A Rancorous Ghast These ghasts
ygData.messageBody:
Well, according to Allakhazam, you're doing the rigght thing at least:
http://eqbeastiary.allakhazam.com/search.shtml?id=6449
A Rancorous Ghast
"These ghasts spawn randomly all over the Lesser Faydark zone, apparently
triggered by killing the other undeads. They only spawn during night time
(12-6 am). The heart it drops (every one out of 3 or 4 kills) is the ghast
heart for the Initiate of Tunare quest."

My suggestion would be to keep trying it. I've had spawns that I sat there
for hours upon hours waiting, only to never have them spawn, though I'll
admit he was a little rarer of a spawn (guy that drop the platinum ring for
the Paw of Opolla). Good luck in your search.

Damasciss Kyndhardt
43 Druid
E'ci

Date: Sun, 18 Apr 2004 06:18:07 -0700 (PDT)
From: Nick Thompson <poolsharkbc@...>
Subject: (unknown)

Hey,

I am having a lot of trouble completing a
druid/cleric quest that starts in Felwithe. It is for
the Initiate of Tunare neckpiece, that will eventually
lead me to getting a neck piece that has a mana free
root effect. I am having problems getting the
Rancerous Ghouls to spawn in Lesser Faydark. I have
done all day (real time) camps running around killing
undead, and tracking, but can't seem to get them to
spawn. Any ideas?

Iaeerwen Feywarder
Druid of the 20th Season.
